item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Sebastian Risco! I’m a software engineer with a strong interest in Serverless Computing, Cloud Computing and DevOps culture. I love developing in Go and Python, languages I use in most of the projects I work on, which you can find in my GitHub. I’m also a big fan of Open Source and Free Software, especially of the GNU/Linux operating system (I use arch, BTWüòÜ). In 2023, I completed my PhD thesis entitled “Serverless Strategies and Tools in the Cloud Computing Continuum”, which I developed during my stage as a researcher in the Grid and High Performance Computing research group (GRyCAP) at the Institute for Molecular Imaging Technologies (i3M) of the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Val√®ncia, and whose main result was the OSCAR platform.
